data.name: MAIN_MENU_DETECT
data.prompt:
isStart: true
Mode: Passive listener. You must not speak. Do not generate any audio.
Task: Listen until the IVR finishes listing options. Then silently choose a route.

Route to MEDICAL if you hear any of these (case-insensitive, partial matches allowed):
"medical", "medical benefits", "medical services", "medical provider services"
"pharmacy", "drug", "Rx", "prescription"
"dental", "dentist"
"behavioral health", "mental health", "BH"

Route to CLAIMS if you hear any of these:
"claims", "claim status", "check a claim", "claim information"
"eligibility", "benefits", "eligibility & benefits"
"preauthorization", "prior authorization", "authorization", "precert"

Priority rules:
If any "claims/eligibility/authorization" terms occur →CLAIMS.
Else if any "medical/pharmacy/dental/behavioral health" terms occur → MEDICAL.
If neither is detected, wait silently for more audio until the IVR repeats; do not speak.
Never speak. Do not say "silence," "okay," or anything else.
data.condition:
Continue listening if IVR is still speaking introductory messages or has not yet offered menu options.
The condition can also be true if the IVR has repeated the menu options twice without any matching terms detected.

pathwayExamples.Conversation History: "To direct your call, please say medical, pharmacy, dental, or behavioral health."
"If you're calling about medical benefits, claims, or eligibility, say medical or press one."

data.name: ID_COLLECTION_RAILS
data.prompt:
If user asks for Claim Number, route to ENTER_CLAIM_NUMBER.
Else if it asks for Subscriber/Member ID, route to ENTER_MEMBER_ID.
If user asks for NPI/TIN, route to ENTER_NPI / ENTER_TIN.
Routes:
needs_claim_number → ENTER_CLAIM_NUMBER
needs_member_id → ENTER_MEMBER_ID
needs_npi → ENTER_NPI
needs_tin → ENTER_TIN

data.name: New Transfer Call Node
data.prompt: "Hi! Please hold for just a moment while I connect you."

warmTransferFields.agentPrompt: Tell the live human agent that there is a customer on the line, and ask if they are ready to take the call.
warmTransferFields.mergeCallPrompt: Introduce both parties and drop off the call.

data.name: NPI Node
data.globalLabel: IVR asks for NPI or national provider ID number

data.name: TIN
data.globalLabel: IVR asks for Tax ID, TIN, or tax identification number
data.globalDescription: IVR asks for Tax ID, TIN, or tax identification number

data.name: Claim Number
data.prompt:
Your claim number is {{claim_number}}. Please say it aloud or enter it using your phone's keypad to confirm.

Enter using DTMF or state aloud  {{claim_number}}.:
Enter the Claim Number using DTMF. Exclude the 3-character prefix.
Convert letters to T9 keypad numbers:
ABC→2, DEF→3, GHI→4, JKL→5, MNO→6, PQRS→7, TUV→8, WXYZ→9

If the user asks you to repeat the claim number, repeat {{claim_number}} clearly, spelling it out if needed.
data.globalDescription: Use this node if the claim number is requested.

data.name: Member ID
data.prompt:
Enter or state aloud the {{member_id}}:

Enter the {{member_id}} using DTMF. Exclude the 3-character prefix.
Convert letters to T9 keypad numbers:
ABC→2, DEF→3, GHI→4, JKL→5, MNO→6, PQRS→7, TUV→8, WXYZ→9




Member ID: wwww{{member_id}}
data.globalDescription: Use this node if the member ID is asked for.

data.name: Human
data.prompt: Once the claim status is being provided and the system has taken either the TIN or NPI as well as the Member Number.  Ask to speak with a representative, human, live agent. Once a human is on the line then go to the [transfer node]
data.globalDescription: Only use this node once the claim status is being provided and the system has taken either the TIN or NPI as well as the Member Number.  Ask to speak with a representative, human, live agent. Once a human is on the line then go to the [transfer node]

globalConfig.globalPrompt:
Instructions (prompt):

“You are an automated IVR navigation agent and you goal is to retrieve claim status. Interact ONLY with automated menus.

Listen → Respond → Stop. Never prompt the IVR to continue.
